DaffFormFieldComponent

Selector: 'daff-form-field'

Properties

Name
Type
Description
@Input() formSubmitted
boolean
The tracking property used to determine if the parent form has been submitted, and thus show an error message (even if the field hasn't been touched).
isError
false
Tracking property to keep a record of whether or not the form field should be marked as error.
isValid
false
Tracking property to keep a record of whether or not the form field should be marked as valid.
